description: Pun on kleptomania treated by 'taking' something, literally.
title: Clever Thief
n_1: Kevin confesses his problem to Doc in the clinic.
c1_1: Doc, I think I have kleptomania!
n_2: Doc listens intently as Kevin explains.
n_3: Kevin looks around nervously, then smirks.
n_4: Kevin grins, pulling something from his pocket.
c1_4: I already took something for it.
c2_4: Kevin! That’s not what I meant!
